page.title: 15HEALTH CARE AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: THE HEALTH OF THE PEOPLE AT TEVIOTHEAD IS LOOKED AFTER BY DOCTORS IN HAWICK, 10 MILES AWAY. THEY TRAVEL THERE TO THE DOCTORS' SURGERY, FOR PHYSIOTHERAPY TREATMENT AND DENTAL CARE.{MINOR OPERATIONS}SUCH AS VARICOSE VEINS AND HERNIAS ARE DEALT WITH AT HAWICK COTTAGE HOSPITAL. BIRTHS ARE AT THE HAIG MATERNITY HOME IN HAWICK BUT IF COMPLICATIONS OCCUR, THE MOTHERS ARE TAKEN TO EDINBURGH, 60 MILES AWAY. CHILDREN AT SCHOOL HAVE REGULAR MEDICAL CHECKS AND ARE EXAMINED FOR HEAD LICE. THERE IS ALSO A SCHOOL DENTAL SERVICE. {BROKEN BONES}AND OPERATIONS SUCH AS APPENDIX ARE SEEN TO AT PEEL HOSPITAL NEAR GALASHIELS SOME 30 MILES AWAY. THIS IS DEFINITELY NOT A PLACE TO LIVE IF YOU REQUIRE REGULAR MEDICAL TREATMENT AS THE TRAVEL INVOLVED IS CONSIDERABLE.
